How to be the best car company?

How to be the best insurance company?
How to be the best company that makes food?
Many managers frame of reference for strategy is how do I become the best?

It's not about being the best.
There is no best way of competing.
It all depends on who you're trying to serve.
It all depends on which particular needs the company is trying to meet.
No company can be successful trying to meet all the needs of every customer.
It all depends on who's buying the car.
It all depends on how they're using the car.
It all depends on their income.
Strategy is not about trying to be the best.
Strategy is about trying to be unique.
